name: Hoth: Main Power Generators (1st Marker) (V)
LocationDStext: While [Virtual Block 2] Imperial Occupation on table, Hoth Energy Shield covers only this site and Echo sites. You may not attempt [Hoth] Epic Events from beyond the 3rd Marker.
LocationLStext: 'Hoth Energy Shield Rules' in effect. If 'blown away,' Light Side loses 3 Force (may not be reduced).
